that should be done in an automated way in order to make sure that every time
you commit changes you're not breaking things that's the whole idea behind continuous delivery is
you one fix doesn't take the whole thing down just because somebody's working on
something doesn't mean that the whole thing is unavailable until they are finished with that now that build and

those are passed into the actual continuous delivery part of the equation
